title: [1.7.2~1.7.10][ssp/smp]Pig Companion 猪猪们！开始战斗！
author: sx1227615162
txt_content:
本帖最后由 sx1227615162 于 2014-8-16 21:41 编辑 

哇咔咔，大家嚎，我SX君又回来了！，一天搬运俩mod,真不容易啊。下面跟大家介绍一款mod,跟猪有关！

介绍：这款mod是让猪获得攻击性，（不是普通猪）而是这种猪：没错！看着它水汪汪的眼睛就知道它肯定是个战斗的好料！这是MOD特有的猪，它不吃胡萝卜，只吃小麦（牛羊变种吗？！{:10_524:} )

猪的种类：从左到右，分别是：皮革帽猪，铁头盔猪，黄金帽猪，钻石帽猪，到了这时，有人跑过来问我：猪怎么不攻击？然后我就平静的说：“你丫猪还没教会它们怎么战斗！你脑子瓦特了？！”。某某人：怎么教它们呢？我：“这?还不简单！拿颗种♂子右键它们啊！蠢货！”。果不其然，就变成了这幅模样:
某某人：哦哦哦原来是这样！，那它们怎么打怪？我：哇啊啊，它们见怪就打!你丫咋那么傻啊！ 某某人:...........
基本介绍完了，还有些东西需要合成,一个是猪鞍还有一个是马铃薯钓竿某某人：有什么用呢？我：和平常骑猪一样，某某人：为何我合成马铃薯钓竿为何游戏就崩，我：估计是bug吧，让猪儿跟着你们，手上拿个小麦。某某人:.......




下面是作者原话，本人英语渣渣，用机翻又怕被喷，我还是发下来了2. How to armor, tame and make your pig follow you  To armor a mob, simply right-click it with a helmet you want to armor it with. You can armor a pig with a leather, a iron, a gold and a diamond helmet. So not with a chain helmet!! You can only tame pigs when they are armored. Now, to tame the pig, simply feed it seeds, by right clicking on the pig with seeds. Now your pigs will attack mobs when they come close to it. To make your pig follow you, simply hold wheat in your hand and then it will follow you.   3. Pig-attacks on every mob:  Enderman --> These are the worst monsters for the pig. Enderman can easily kill much pigs, and they will be killed by around 2 or 3 diamond armored pigs.  Zombie Pigman --> These are pretty nasty for pigs because they are always in big groups and they have a fine golden sword. These can sometimes be killed by 1 diamond armored pig.  Blaze --> Pigs are very effective against this mobs. Pigs are very fast and can easily dodge the fireballs these mobs shoot. Diamond armored pigs will surely kill these mobsPosted Image  Cave Spider --> Will make a pig poisoned, but they will survive and kill this mob. It's very difficult to see your pig suffer, but revenge will be there. These mobs will be killed by 1 diamond armored pig.  Creeper --> Pigs won't attack these mob, because that would be suicide, but creepers won't attack pigs anyways. You will have to kill these mobs yourself.  Ghast --> Pigs can't fly...  Magma Cube --> Pigs will easily kill these mobs, but a big magma cube will take some time... A pig won't be hurt killing these mobs.  Silverfish --> Do you hate these annoying mobs? Pigs are also little mobs so they can easily find these mobs and they ca n easily kill these mobs.  Skeleton --> You thought a skeleton never misses. They will. Pigs are far too small for a skeleton to hit. Maybe a skeleton will hit once or twice, but that won't kill your pig.  Slime --> Pigs will easily kill these mobs, but a big slime will take some time... A pig won't be hurt killing these mobs. (just like the magma cube)  Spider --> Will take some serious hits on the pig, and can kill a pig, so watch out for spiders.  Zombie --> These mobs are scared as hell for pigs. Pigs usually turn into a zombie pigman when hit (then they would be much stronger with a golden sword), and that's why zombie's won't so a single hit on your pig. So your pig can easily kill a zombie, without being killed itself. Very useful... (and don't be scared, your cute pig won't turn into a zombie pigman)   4.Strength of every form of the pig  Leather armored pig --> 1.5x more health as normal pig  Iron armored pig --> 3x more health as normal pig  Gold armored pig --> 3x more health as normal pig  Diamond armored pig --> 5x more health as normal pig  ------ Stuff to give the pigs more attack damage is coming ------   5.Crafting   Image  Upgraded saddles (These saddles can be applied to SuperPigs/Armored Pigs/Companions)   Image  Potato on a stack (your pigs will follow this)   6. Credits  I really want to thank Jambo and Deth Glitch fromSch00lb0ygamersfor getting the idea for this mod, helping me out with some problems, making a video for this mod as fast as they could and making a awesome map to test this mod on. You really should like their review of this mod, give the tester world for this mod a diamond, subscribe to their youtube channel and give them a nice comment on how awesome they are. And from me you guys get:
下载地址：http://pan.baidu.com/s/1pJr0o1l
不回复不打赏不会死人的喵~

那么我们下期见，88{:10_512:} {:10_513:}
